EntryName	LSM12_HUMAN
ProteinName	Protein LSM12
GeneName	LSM12
Length	195
Function	Nicotinic acid adenine dinucleotide phosphate (NAADP) binding protein (PubMed:34362892). Confers NAADP sensitivity to the two pore channel complex (TPCs) by acting as TPC accessory protein necessary for NAADP-evoked Ca(2+) release (PubMed:34362892).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm
